Given all the context provided, It was decided to consider archetypes with `acceptedParents=":Proteus-document"` as "first level archetypes". This will make them appear in the archetype menu and not the context menu unless someone models a document archetype that explicitly accept that specific class as child.
This decision was taken because, if an archetype can only be child of a document, it is consider important enough to the application context and must be included in the archetype menu with the rest of archetypes.
